price: Razvedenim ženama pripada otpremnina u skladu s propisom i na lijep način, i to je obaveza bogobojaznih.
arabic: وَلِلۡمُطَلَّقَٰتِ مَتَٰعُۢ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِۖ حَقًّا عَلَى ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walil'muṭallaqāti matāʿun bil-maʿrūfi ḥaqqan ʿalā al-mutaqīna
